The amortization for owned content predominantly monetized on an individual basis is recorded using the individual film forecast computation method, which recognizes the costs in the same ratio as the associated ultimate revenue. This method estimates ultimate revenue and total costs based on anticipated release patterns and distribution strategies, public acceptance, and historical results for similar productions.

Item 8 of the Annual Report on Form 10-K details the financial statements and supplementary data of a company. This section provides a comprehensive overview of the company's financial condition, including balance sheets, income statements, cash flow statements, and statements of shareholders' equity. It also includes notes to the financial statements, which offer additional context and explanations for the figures presented. The supplementary data may include information on market risk, legal proceedings, and other relevant data that can help investors and analysts better understand the company

Item 8 of a document typically contains the company's financial statements and any supplementary data that provides additional context or details about the financial information presented. This may include the balance sheet, income statement, statement of cash flows, and statement of shareholders' equity. It may also include notes to the financial statements, which provide further explanation and disclosure of accounting policies, contingencies, and other relevant information. The supplementary data may include information such as management's discussion and analysis (MD&A), segment reporting, and other relevant financial data. Item
